mapper.select: SELECT id AS "id", icon AS "icon", name AS "name", permission AS "permission", remark AS "remark", sort AS "sort", type AS "type", value AS "value", fk_parent_id AS "fk_parent_id" FROM tb_resource WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id AS "id", icon AS "icon", name AS "name", permission AS "permission", remark AS "remark", sort AS "sort", type AS "type", value AS "value", fk_parent_id AS "fk_parent_id" FROM tb_resource WHERE fk_parent_id = #{id}

SELECT r.id AS "id", r.icon AS "icon", r.name AS "name", r.permission AS "permission", r.remark AS "remark", r.sort AS "sort", r.type AS "type", r.value AS "value", r.fk_parent_id AS "fk_parent_id" FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_group_resource gr ON gr.fk_resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON gr.fk_group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tb_group_user gu ON gu.fk_group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON gu.fk_user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY r.id ORDER BY r.sort

SELECT r.id AS "id", r.icon AS "icon", r.name AS "name", r.permission AS "permission", r.remark AS "remark", r.sort AS "sort", r.type AS "type", r.value AS "value", r.fk_parent_id AS "fk_parent_id" FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_group_resource gr ON gr.fk_resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON gr.fk_group_id = g.id WHERE g.id = #{groupId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resource ( icon, name, permission, remark, sort, type, value, fk_parent_id ) VALUES ( #{entity.icon}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.permission}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.value}, #{entity.fk_parent_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_resource SET icon=#{entity.icon}, name=#{entity.name}, permission=#{entity.permission}, remark=#{entity.remark}, sort=#{entity.sort}, type=#{entity.type}, value=#{entity.value}, fk_parent_id=#{entity.fk_parent_id} WHERE id = #{entity.id}
